node_2: most expensive box office flops of all time
edge: Gigli's worldwide gross of $7.7 million against a $75.6 million budget made it one of the most expensive box office flops of all time.
Gigli was panned by critics as stated in the context.
Gigli stars Bradley Cooper and Jennifer Lopez lacked chemistry as mentioned in the context.
During the same period as mentioned in the context, Sony Pictures had successful movies Bad Boys II and S.W.A.T.
Was the subject of an article in satirical newspaper, The Onion, titled 'Gigli focus groups demand new ending in which Affleck and Lopez die.'
in this movie, Affleck is portrayed as a member of the filming crew parodying his role in Argo
